Judul: THE ANALYSIS OF PARENTING STRATEGY IN PT MEDCO E&P INDONESIA
Abstrak:
The Analysis of Parenting Strategy in PT Medco E & P Indonesia, has been conducted using the Parenting-Fits Matrix. The purpose of the study is to analyze whether PT Medco E & P Indonesia as an operating-holding company in managing the Indonesia E&P Oil & gas subsidiaries of MedcoEnergi applied an appropriate parenting strategy.  
 

During the study, the Critical Success Factor and Parenting Opportunities from each Business Unit / Assets are identified, by conducting in-depth interviews on which involved 25 respondents from Asset Management. Determination the level of balance between Parenting Characteristic of PT Medco E & P Indonesia with the Critical Success Factor and Parenting Opportunities of Assets was conducted by distributing questionnaire involving 18 respondents who hold a high level position in the organization of PT Medco E & P Indonesia.  
 

The study shows that Rimau, South & Central Sumatra, and Lematang Assets are in Heartland area. While Tarakan & Sembakung and Block A Assets are in Edge of Heartland area.  
 

According to the result, it is recommended to Medco Management to apply business strategy based on Critical Success Factor and Parenting Opportunities with low of fulfillment.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing Thesis: Dr. Ir. Mohammad Toha
Kata Kunci: Operating Holding, Parenting Fit Matrix, Parenting Strategy, Critical Success Factor, Parenting Opportunities, Parenting Characteristic
